Uses of Interface
org.divxdede.text.formatter.PatternFormatter.ArgumentNameSpace

  • Packages that use PatternFormatter.ArgumentNameSpace 
    Package Description
    org.divxdede.text.formatter  

    • Uses of PatternFormatter.ArgumentNameSpace in org.divxdede.text.formatter

      Subinterfaces of PatternFormatter.ArgumentNameSpace in org.divxdede.text.formatter 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  PatternFormatter.AttributeArgumentNameSpace
      AttributeArgumentNameSpace is a namespace binding conversion's identifier to a particular property of the argument.
      static interface  PatternFormatter.DetailedArgumentNameSpace
      This extended implementation of ArgumentNameSpace allow to control more informations on arguments like: Flags that can modify the output format Width that give the minium number of characters Precision that restrict the number of characters (depend of the conversion)
      static interface  PatternFormatter.IndexableArgumentNameSpace
      IndexableArgumentNameSpace is a namespace that can define which argument must be used for formatting a specified conversion's identifier.
      Classes in org.divxdede.text.formatter that implement PatternFormatter.ArgumentNameSpace 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PatternFormatter.CompositeArgumentNameSpace
      This namespace implementation allow to compose a namespace from differents one.
      static class  PatternFormatter.DefaultArgumentNameSpace
      Default implementation of ArgumentNameSpace accepting standard symbols for all supported conversions.
      Methods in org.divxdede.text.formatter that return PatternFormatter.ArgumentNameSpace 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PatternFormatter.ArgumentNameSpace PatternFormatter.Pattern.getNameSpace()
      Retrieve the namespace used for this compiled-pattern
      Methods in org.divxdede.text.formatter with parameters of type PatternFormatter.ArgumentNameSpace 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static PatternFormatter.Pattern PatternFormatter.compile(String pattern, PatternFormatter.ArgumentNameSpace namespace)
      Compile a pattern that can be re-used for formatting string with the #toString(Object... args) method.
      Constructors in org.divxdede.text.formatter with parameters of type PatternFormatter.ArgumentNameSpace 
      Constructor and Description
      PatternFormatter.CompositeArgumentNameSpace(PatternFormatter.ArgumentNameSpace... ns)
